brainly_data.question: What ways does the great gatsby represent modernism?
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.question: What ways does the great gatsby represent modernism?
all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text: Throughout the novel there are circumstances in which Gatsby shows he is modern such as his clothes, his car and even his house. These are all things that are different from other for example Tom who is old fashioned and the opposite of Gatsby.

top_answer.subject: English
top_answer.text: Throughout the novel there are circumstances in which Gatsby shows he is modern such as his clothes, his car and even his house. These are all things that are different from other for example Tom who is old fashioned and the opposite of Gatsby.
